ygData.subject: Re: Mane Attraction
ygData.msgSnippet: Galtin, I carry a couple head items with me. If I were you I would hang onto that Mane Attraction so you don t have to bother with the Siryn Hair Hood (which I
ygData.messageBody:
Galtin,

I carry a couple head items with me. If I were you I would hang onto that
Mane Attraction so you don't have to bother with the Siryn Hair Hood (which
I usually wear). I did not know the stats of the Mane. If I wear you, I'd
get another helm with good AC to switch to when Cha isn't needed and you're
in battle so looks aren't *as* important. Lambent is good (which I use
because it has to be blue to match my outfit hehe), but Skull Shape Barbute
stats are wonderful :) Oh, and hang onto the BI crown for the resists when
you do dragon raids, which imo is the only time we really need to worry
about the resist gear. Our songs give us great resists!

As far as earrings go, I was a charisma queen until about 45, when I
realized it just wasn't too important anymore. I still leave on one of my
Opalline earrings (it's 2ac also), but on my other ear I have a +4 Str one.

Take care and hope to run into you one of these days.
Demari Dreamsong
E'ci


-----Original Message-----
From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 <g4mntofcr@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, February 14, 2000 7:44 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Mane Attraction


>From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
>I recently posted a request for feedback on whether I should equip an
>Executioner Hood or Blackened Iron Crown. Another factor has entered the
>equation now that I was able to complete the Mane Attraction quest. If you
>aren't familiar with it, the Mane Attraction quest is a sub quest for the
>ranger Raincaller bow quest. Part of the quest requires rangers to give
the
>Mane Attraction (a toupee that is AC4, +10 CHR) to a gnome in Akanon. The
>good thing about this is that you don't have to be a ranger to complete the
>Mane Attraction quest. It will take a high level party to go deep into
>Kedge to get one of the components but other than that the other components
>are fairly easy to acquire. One good thing about the Mane is that there is
>no visible headpiece so now I don't look like a cross between a Vulcan and
a
>Ferengi (when I wore the BI Crown).
>
>When wearing the Mane, I lose one AC compared to the Exe Hood and BI Crown
>(both 5 AC). I also lose the extra STR that both provide but that is
offset
>by the +10 to CHR. The biggest loss is the +5 boost to all resist rates
>that the BI Crown gives. Is +10 to CHR more important than +5 to all
>resists? The jury remains out on that. I suppose I could replace the 2
>opalline earrings I'm currently wearing (that would put me back to 130
CHR).
>I haven't been in the jewelry market lately so I'm not certain what would
be
>a good replacement. What all earrings can I wear to increase STR, AC
and/or
>HPs?
>
>Galtin of E'ci
>
>
>
